alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hempstead; Lafayette; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hempstead, eastern Lafayette, Nevada and Columbia Counties, Webster, southwestern Caddo, northwestern Claiborne, Bossier Parishes in northwestern Louisiana and southeastern Harrison Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 329 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Washington to near Hope to 7 miles southwest of Bodcaw to near Lewisville to near Bradley to near Belcher to 8 miles west of Elysian Fields. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Minden, Magnolia, Hope, Springhill, Prescott, Stamps, Waldo, McNeil, Haughton, Greenwood, Blanchard, Haynesville, Waskom, Benton, Cullen, Plain Dealing, Cotton Valley and Sarepta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
